content: colourful mini dino free crochet pattern by handmade by ani have fun making this little dino in bright or pastel colours thank you for downloading this pattern if you have any questions feel free to contact me details below i would love to see your makes please share them with me via email or tag me on social media and use these hashtags #handmadebyani #colourfulminidino get in touch instagram @handmade__byani facebook handmade by ani / @handmadebyaniau email handmadebyani2017@gmail com blog https //handmadebyani blogspot com/ find more patterns on lovecrafts and ravelry disclaimer please do not redistribute sell or claim this pattern whole or in part as your own you may sell finished items handmade by you in limited quantities from this pattern - if you do please credit handmade by ani anika kam as the designer 1 ©handmade by ani 2020 instagram @handmade__byani | facebook @handmadebyaniau notes this pattern uses uk terminology this pattern is worked in continuous rounds unless otherwise specified rounded brackets indicate the pattern and the number of times it is repeated e g double_crochet 1 increase x 6 means double_crochet one stitch increase in the next stitch repeat 6 times square brackets indicate the number of stitches you should have after each round/row use a stitch marker or piece of scrap yarn to mark the start of each round/row materials head and body 8 ply dk cotton in green spikes 8 ply dk cotton in blue black embroidery thread to embroider mouth pink embroidery thread to embroider cheeks 3mm crochet hook yarn needle polyester fibrefill stuffing 8mm safety eyes colourful mini dino will be approximately 7 5cm tall when using the suggested yarn weight and hook size abbreviations - uk terminology double_crochet double_crochet increase double_crochet increase decrease double_crochet invisible decrease r round st s stitch es chain chain disclaimer please do not redistribute sell or claim this pattern whole or in part as your own you may sell finished items handmade by you in limited quantities from this pattern - if you do please credit handmade by ani anika kam as the designer 2 ©handmade by ani 2020 instagram @handmade__byani | facebook @handmadebyaniau conversion table - uk vs us terminology uk us double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet half treble_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet double_crochet chain chain chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch useful videos magic_ring us terminology invisible decrease us terminology joining tail to body us terminology re-join yarn using a standing crochet stitch us terminology close an amigurumi piece note i am not affiliated with these youtube videos disclaimer please do not redistribute sell or claim this pattern whole or in part as your own you may sell finished items handmade by you in limited quantities from this pattern -
